title: The Ossians
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The long expanse of the West Sands looked like a ruffled amber tablecloth in the spilt light of the town.

title: The Ossians
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Keith suggested a walk along the beach so they stocked up on booze from the van and headed towards the West Sands.

title: A noble life /
author: Craik, Dinah Maria Mulock
snippet: indeed it was not easy to forget — the impression made in the good old town by the two new - comers, when they first ajDpeared in the quiet streets, along the Links and on the West Sands — everywhere that the little carriage could he drawn.
